title: Easy Reading Kids Can Learn With: 13 Short Stories To Build Character
description: Once you start reading my short stories, you won't want to stop! My kid's are engaged by the hilarious, and also inspirational characters. You won't want to pass this one up!This GIANT bundle has stories about building trust, stories about being kind, stories about planning ahead, and stories about making the right choices!All of these stories are easy to read and will help your children learn lessons, morals, and build character. Some of these short stories are kind and cute, some are exciting and adventurous.Parents & Grandparents love reading these books to their children & grandchildren!**Scroll up and click "Buy Now" to reserve your copy now!**
author: Betty J. Byers
